text: The mobile phone industry in Pakistan is a growing industry. According to figures from the Pakistan Telecommunication Authority (PTA), there were 152 million mobile 'phone subscribers' in Pakistan in March 2019. ==Growth of mobile phones industry== PTA figures for 2007, for comparison, reported 48.5 million subscribers, rising to 102 million (over 60% of the population) by December 2010. In 2007, the largest mobile telephone company in Pakistan was Mobilink, and other companies included Wateen (a member of Dhabi Group). In 2010, there were five mobile phone companies in Pakistan. == See also == * Paktel * Zong Pakistan ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Mobile phone companies of Pakistan Pakistan Category:Industries of Pakistan
title: Mobile phone industry in Pakistan
